item.title: IT Related Legislations in Sri Lanka
item.description: IT Related Legislations In Sri Lanka 1. Data Protection Act - Personal Data Protection Act No: 09 Of 2022 - personal data could be collected only for a specified purpose and not for any other purpose that is incompatible with the said purposes.

item.title: Main Areas of IT Law
item.description: Main Areas Of IT Law Electronic commerce the [[nibm_notes/introduction_to_computer_science/laws_on_IT/IT_related_legislations_in_Sri_Lanka#2 Electronic Transactions Act|electrocin transcation act]] and [[nibm_notes/introduction_to_computer_science/laws_on_IT/IT_related_legislations_in_Sri_Lanka#3 Digital Signature and Authentication Regime| digital signature and authentication regime]] supports this.
